text.name: longdescription
text.text: CD-ROM add-on to the Megadrive, it launched many FMV games, including the infamous Night Trap, which led to the creation of the ESRB. CPU Motorola 68000 @12.5MHz, 64kbit int. RAM, Sound Ricoh RF5C164, Release date JP: 12 Dec '91 NA: 15 Oct '92 UK: 2 Apr '93 EU: '93.
